CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Riot Blockchain Inc is focused on building, supporting, and operating blockchain technologies. Distributed blockchain technology is a decentralized and encrypted ledger that is designed to offer a secure, efficient, verifiable, and permanent way of storing records and other information without the need for intermediaries. It serves as a medium of exchange, store of value, or unit of account. The company's segments include Bitcoin Mining; Data Center Hosting and Electrical Products and Engineering. It generates maximum revenue from the Bitcoin Mining segment.
